hadiths.text: The tradition mentioned above has also been transmitted by ‘Asim bin Kulaib through a different chain of narrators to the same effect

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي النَّفْلِ مِنَ الذَّهَبِ وَالْفِضَّةِ وَمِنْ أَوَّلِ مَغْنَمٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding The Nafl Of Gold And Silver, And From The Spoils Gained In The Beginning (Of The Battle)
